wordpressPost.title: 8 Rejuvenation Tips to help you feel great
wordpressPost.content:
8 Rejuvenation Tips to help you feel great!

 

Tip #1

Try to eliminate sugar and white flour – You will not regret this!  To reduce your cravings as you eliminate these, eat protein for breakfast like eggs, tofu scramble or a protein shake.  Use Stevia for sweetener.

Tip #2

 

Always combine “good” proteins, fats and carbs at each meal.  For example, fish and salad with avocado or at snack time, nuts, berries.

Tip #3

 

Try and drink filtered water throughout the day.
If you hate water, add fruit and Stevia for extra flavor, especially lemon.
At the end of the day, you’ll be surprised on how much you drink when adding flavor.

 

Tip #4

Take 15 minutes a day for yourself.  
Sit outside or next to a window and daydream.
 Reflect on the person that you are.  Don’t think about your to-do list.  
Just let your thoughts flow and daydream like when you were a kid.

Tip #5

Try to only take medications that you absolutely need to.  
If you have a headache rather than quickly take a pain reliever, lay down and use an ice pack.  
Give your body time to heal and then decide.

Tip #6

Try not to rush or be in a hurry.  
Take your time and move slower.  
Everything will still be there either way.  
Before getting out of bed in the morning, rather than grab your phone, close your eyes and appreciate, pray or just be present before the day takes over.

Tip #7

What are your most toxic habits?  
Make a list of the top three and try to eliminate one of them.  
It could be things like procrastination, drinking too much, bitterness, eating sugar, or whatever.  
Choose one.
 

Tip #8

I think this tip of the day has to be the most important one of all.
Every morning go to your mirror, look straight into your eyes and say, “I love you” and mean it. 
Let the inner child and the adult become one and heal any damage from the past.
 When you can see your soul (it may take a few times) you won’t believe how transforming it can be.

 

8 Rejuvenation Tips to help you feel great!

 

If you would like to feel fantastic without detoxing then check out “The Rejuvenation Program”  It’s just six steps to add to your life that will transform how you look and feel!
